name: opex-manager-v2
description: OPEX Manager - Python/FastAPI + React/Vite Unified Stack

scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && python seed.py
scripts.setup:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && python -c "import shutil, os; [shutil.rmtree(d) for d in ['__pycache__', 'app/__pycache__', 'logs'] if os.path.exists(d)]"
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && python -c "import shutil, os; [shutil.rmtree(d) for d in ['dist', 'node_modules'] if os.path.exists(d)]"
